query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, COLUMN_TYPE, IS_NULLABLE, COLUMN_KEY, COLUMN_DEFAULT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME='partner_deals' ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2KQuguC66uRWakj.490d29c7f976 --database d8D2GoF7wZHc9ZPzYZfLpT --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, COLUMN_TYPE, IS_NULLABLE, COLUMN_KEY, COLUMN_DEFAULT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME='partner_deals' ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION
stdout:
